description: A fast breakdown of Strategic Pivots for builders.

hook.text: Slack started as a gaming company. The game failed, but the internal chat tool they built became a $27 billion business.

climax.text: Leaders know it's time to pivot when data contradicts assumptions and doubling down yields diminishing returns.

quiz.question: What is a strategic pivot?
